Event.name: Erasing
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes a piece of <fen>Information</fen> from a <fen>Document</fen> such that it cannot be retrieved.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>deleted</t> <fex name="Information">the last line</fex> <fex name="Document">from my essay</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Information
Arg.definition: <def-root>The thing that the <fen>Agent</fen> removes from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Document
Arg.definition: <def-root>The collection of pieces of information from which the specific <fen>Information</fen> is removed.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The way in which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time when the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The means by which the <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> removes the <fen>Information</fen> from the <fen>Document</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: strike.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: delete from a written record by drawing a line through or erasing

lexUnit.name: delete.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: remove from a store of information, often electronic

lexUnit.name: erase.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: irrevocably remove from a document

lexUnit.name: expunge.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: erase, strike, or blot out

lexUnit.name: kill.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: remove or delete from a store of information
